author: Upper Echelon
description:
Take your personal data back with Incogni! Use code ECHELON at the link below and get 60% off an annual plan: https://incogni.com/echelon

In a perpetual war between YouTube and Adblock... a particular change in August appears to have caused unintended collateral damage. 

By logging a certain URL on a widely utilized list, the tracking of authentic desktop views for those using adblocking third party software appears to have been broken, leading to drastically reduced viewership for a large number of channels. 

Despite certain claims that this is a common and seasonal change, the reality is that this was an unexpected consequence of YouTubes hyper aggression with advertising, and the pushback that they get from extensions looking to block their ads form showing.

title: Collateral Damage in the Adblock War
